main_projects.title: Findateam
main_projects.details: An aggregator website to find teams or members much easier by filtering posts from popular itch.io game jams.

main_projects.title: itch.io Community Scraper API
main_projects.details: A custom scraper API that collects game jams and filters recruitment posts from itch.io community forums made for findateam.

main_projects.title: Yamazakura Portfolio Website
main_projects.details: A dynamic portfolio website deployed on Vercel, featuring serverless database integration to showcase a writer's works. This is the first full stack website that I've developed.

misc_projects.title: All Hallow's Eve
misc_projects.details: A 1-bit horror visual novel made using RenPy in participation for a halloween themed game jam.

misc_projects.title: GitHub Pages Repository
misc_projects.details: The GitHub repository for my website.

misc_projects.title: Research Paper: Detecting Biodegradable Materials in Waste Piles Using YOLO Object Detection Model
misc_projects.details: My thesis paper studying the effectiveness of real-time object detection for garbage segregation.
